location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire, to James Farish, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter refers to commands from the Government of Bombay that William Bruce discontinue his purchases of raw silk on the grounds that the silk is of inferior quality. Bruce confirms that no more silk will be purchased until further notice.
